round_best: Develop a "conceptual depth sensor" system for large generative models which dynamically measures and visualizes the depth of thematic layers during text generation. This system would use a depth estimation algorithm tailored to the model's activation pathways, enabling real-time adjustments to the depth of certain topics or concepts, thereby enhancing the model’s ability to self-regulate undesirable content before it materializes in output. This approach would allow operators to set depth thresholds that maintain creativity while ensuring ethical boundaries are respected, effectively balancing freedom and control in generative outputs.
